shortDescription: The YARN NodeManager in Apache Hadoop 2.7.3 and 2.7.4 can leak the password for credential store provider used by the NodeManager to YARN Applications.
vulnerabilityName: Apache Hadoop 2.7.3 and 2.7.4 YARN NodeManager Password Disclosure
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
